com.milk.asynch
Class IdleFilter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.asynch.SendFilter
        |
        +--com.milk.asynch.IdleFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sender, SendSource
public final class IdleFilter
extends SendFilter

This class provides a way to sense that a sender has gone idle and send out an idle message. Generally, one constructs an IdleFilter handing it a target Sender. Then, instead of sending to the target directly, one sends to the IdleFilter, which will, in general, just resend to the target. However, once messages stop arriving at the IdleFilter, the IdleFilter itself will send an idle message to the target.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1998-1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

IdleFilter

public IdleFilter(Sender target,
                  java.lang.Object idleMessage,
                  long idleTime)
Construct an IdleFilter to send to the given sender, with the given idle timeout.

Parameters:
target - the target to (re)send to
idleMessage - the message to send when idle
idleTime - the time (msec) to wait before sending an idle message
